items.sentence: Tom wanted to give a very special present to his girlfriend.
Tom wanted to know what Mary did during her summer vacation.
It was obvious that Tom was trying to get Mary\'s attention.
It wasn\'t as difficult to do that as I thought it would be.
It wasn\'t as simple to do as we thought it was going to be.
We can\'t even be certain that it was Tom\'s voice we heard.
In 1860, Lincoln was elected President of the United States.
In Japan, people legally become adults at the age of twenty.
It smells like Tom is wearing the same perfume that Mary is.
It takes us thirty minutes to walk from here to the station.
